attributes.action: Dispense with the Services of a petition 'Approval Team'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I urge that he dispenses with an 'Approval Team' for petitions and allow grown up people to put forth grown up views.
If screening is needed, how worthy is this website of the title 'Petition the Prime Minister'

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
